name: Were Dating
description:
Sometimes a date is more than they appear... Were Dating is a short visual novel of blind dates, where only one date is a safe choice.

Created by a group of 4 in a 48 hour game jam, as part of GameMania - hosted by HammerheadVR in Newcastle.

You can follow our works:
Katie - www.facebook.com/preyinteractive/
Loukia - lucydoesart.co.uk
Kiri - Instagram.com/glowgables Instagram.
